articles.description: I’m a bit of a gadget hoarder. I often tend to assume that I can repurpose some old thing—an ancient phone, tablet, or webcam—into something new, so I’m thrilled to see Samsung finally debut its Galaxy Upcycling at Home program, which gives you a way to turn …

articles.title: EA Announces Standalone Battlefield Mobile Game - IGN - IGN
articles.description: EA announces a new Battlefield game for mobile coming in 2022.
articles.content: EA has announced that its mobile studio Industrial Toys is working with DICE on a new Battlefield game for mobile devices. The mobile Battlefield game is targeting a 2022 launch date.This untitled mo… [+2036 chars]
